show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

title: Environmental Toxins / Fracking
content: A talk with Sandra Steingraber, author of Living Downstream and Raising Elijah; the environmental damage wrought by... <!--more--> fracking, and the compliant government officials who receive large campaign donations from the fracking corporations; also her essay “The Fracking of Rachel Carson” in Orion magazine; example of local activism against fracking; poem by Mary Oliver
